turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Ah, I understand the frustration! Finding that specific blend can be a bit challenging. For a psychological thriller standalone, you might consider "Before I Go to Sleep" by S.J. These are well-regarded but perhaps slightly less ubiquitous than the ones I first mentioned. Let me know if those sound closer to what you're looking for!
